properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 2 at 10:45PM MST until January 4 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...High winds possibly returning to portions of central Wyoming...

.An approaching cold front may bring some strong winds to portions
of western and central Wyoming.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
possible. Higher wind gusts are possible in the vicinity of
Clark.

* WHERE...Cody Foothills.

* WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile
vehicles. Watch for strong cross winds on area roads.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
